UpdateSourceArgs: /c for /d %i in ("G:\AMPDatastore\Instances\Rclone01\rclone\serverfiles\rclone-v*-windows-amd64") do (robocopy "%i" "G:\AMPDatastore\Instances\Rclone01\rclone\serverfiles" /MOVE /E /R:0 /W:0 & if exist "%i" (pushd "G:\AMPDatastore\Instances\Rclone01\rclone\serverfiles" & rmdir /S /Q "%i" & popd))
